attributes.additional_details: To much money is going aboard yet we can't even feed ourselves and keep our pensioners warm over winter!
attributes.background:
Stop sending money abroad when our country is in such a mess

To much money is going aboard yet we can't even feed ourselves and keep our pensioners warm over winter!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
